subcategory.subcategory: Equipment for the production of bags from non-woven materials
subcategory.subcategory_uz: Noto'qima materiallardan sumkalar ishlab chiqarish uskunlari
subcategory.subcategory_en: Equipment for the production of bags from non-woven materials

title: Non-woven bag making machine (by 1) US-HBS-700
title_uz: Noto'qima materiallardan sumka ishlab chiqarish uskunasi (1 talik) US-HBS-700
title_ru: Оборудование для производства мешков из нетканого материала (по 1) US-HBS-700
short_description: Non-woven bag production equipment is usually large in size, production capacity is large, and the price is relatively high. But this US-HBS-700 model equipment is cheaper than others. Because the equipment produces one bag at a time, and the production speed reaches from 30 to 70 bags per minute. The weight of the equipment is 400 kg, the length is 1300 mm, the width is 1200 mm and the height is 1500 mm.
short_description_uz: Noto'qima materiallardan sumka ishlab chiqarish uskunalari odatda katta hajmli, ishlab chiqarish hajmi ko'p va narxlari nisbatan qimmat bo'ladi. Ammo ushbu US-HBS-700 modeldagi uskuna boshqalariga qaraganda arzonroq hisoblanadi. Chunki uskuna birdaniga bittadan sumka ishlab chiqaradi va ishlab chiqarish tezligi daqiqasiga 30 tadan 70 tagacha yetadi. Uskunaning vazni 400 kg, uzunligi 1300 mm, kengligi 1200 mm va balandligi 1500 mm ni tashkil etadi.
short_description_ru: Оборудование для производства нетканых мешков обычно имеет большие размеры, производственную мощность большую, а цена относительно высокая. Но оборудование этой модели US-HBS-700 дешевле других. Потому что оборудование производит по одному мешку за раз, а скорость производства достигает от 30 до 70 мешков в минуту. Вес оборудования 400 кг, длина 1300 мм, ширина 1200 мм и высота 1500 мм.
short_description_en: Non-woven bag production equipment is usually large in size, production capacity is large, and the price is relatively high. But this US-HBS-700 model equipment is cheaper than others. Because the equipment produces one bag at a time, and the production speed reaches from 30 to 70 bags per minute. The weight of the equipment is 400 kg, the length is 1300 mm, the width is 1200 mm and the height is 1500 mm.
long_description:
Non-woven bag production equipment is usually large in size, production capacity is large, and the price is relatively high. But this US-HBS-700 model equipment is cheaper than others. Because the equipment produces one bag at a time, and the production speed reaches from 30 to 70 bags per minute. The weight of the equipment is 400 kg, the length is 1300 mm, the width is 1200 mm and the height is 1500 mm.

 

Basic parameters
Model US-HBS-700
Bag width........................................................................................ 250-600 mm...................................................................................................
Loop length 370-580 mm
Material thickness 40-100 gr/m2
Speed 30-70 pcs/min
Voltage 220V
Total power 5.5 kW
Dimension 1300*1200*1500 mm
Weight 400 kg
long_description_uz:
Noto'qima materiallardan sumka ishlab chiqarish uskunalari odatda katta hajmli, ishlab chiqarish hajmi ko'p va narxlari nisbatan qimmat bo'ladi. Ammo ushbu US-HBS-700 modeldagi uskuna boshqalariga qaraganda arzonroq hisoblanadi. Chunki uskuna birdaniga bittadan sumka ishlab chiqaradi va ishlab chiqarish tezligi daqiqasiga 30 tadan 70 tagacha yetadi. Uskunaning vazni 400 kg, uzunligi 1300 mm, kengligi 1200 mm va balandligi 1500 mm ni tashkil etadi. 

 

Umumiy parametrlar
Model US-HBS-700
Sumka kengligi...................................................................................... 250-600 mm.................................................................................................
Tutqich uzunligi 370-580 mm
Material qalinligi 40-100 gr/m2
Ishlab chiqarish tezligi 30-70 dona/min
Kuchlanishi 220V
Quvvati 5.5 kW
Uskuna o'lchami 1300*1200*1500 mm
Vazni 400 kg
long_description_ru:
Оборудование для производства нетканых мешков обычно имеет большие размеры, производственную мощность большую, а цена относительно высокая. Но оборудование этой модели US-HBS-700 дешевле других. Потому что оборудование производит по одному мешку за раз, а скорость производства достигает от 30 до 70 мешков в минуту. Вес оборудования 400 кг, длина 1300 мм, ширина 1200 мм и высота 1500 мм.

 

Общие параметры
Модель US-HBS-700
Ширина сумки....................................................................................... 250-600 мм...................................................................................................
Ширина сумки 370-580 мм
Толщина материала 40-100 г/м2
Скорость производства 30-70 шт./мин.
Напряжение 220B
Мощность 5.5 кВт
Размер оборудования 1300*1200*1500 мм
Масса 400 кг

Non-woven bag production equipment is usually large in size, production capacity is large, and the price is relatively high. But this US-HBS-700 model equipment is cheaper than others. Because the equipment produces one bag at a time, and the production speed reaches from 30 to 70 bags per minute. The weight of the equipment is 400 kg, the length is 1300 mm, the width is 1200 mm and the height is 1500 mm.
